title.content-text: 5.1.2 - The IPv4 Protocol - Example of Network Layer Protocol

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts how the Network Layer uses TCP/IP. IP packets flow through an internetwork consisting of routers and a network cloud. TCP segments are encapsulated into IP packets.

- Connectionless - No connection is established before sending data packets.
- Best Effort (unreliable) - No overhead is used to guarantee packet delivery.
- Media Independent - Operates independently of the medium carrying the data.
